___responsibleParty.description: Individuals and/or organizations other than source and recipient that serve as contact points or other roles related to the allocation

___contactId.description: Identifier matching a contactId in the main contact array.

___organizationMembers.description: Identifies individuals that have an association with an organization contact.

___roleExtent.description: The area or period of time for which the role is valid.

___party.description: Identifies all the contacts associated with the role.

___role.description: Function performed by the contact in the current context.

___onlineResource.description: On-line information related to the allocation.

$eref.description: Information about accessing online resources and services.

___description.description: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does.

___function.description: Function performed by the online resource.

___applicationProfile.description: Name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource.

___protocol.description: The connection protocol to be used such as: ftp, http, etc.

___protocolRequest.description: Request used to access the resource depending on the protocol, e.g. body of POST(http)_ request.

___recipientId.description: The contactId of the entity receiving the allocation.

___amount.description: The amount of the allocation in the indicated currency.

___sourceAllocationId.description: Identifier used by the source contact to reference the allocation.

___comment.description: Additional information relevant to the allocation.

___matching.description: Indicates whether the funds are to be considered matching funds.

___sourceId.description: The contactId of the entity providing the allocation.

___allocation.description: Funds contributed to support the development of the resource.

oneOf.description: A timePeriod with a startDateTime and/or endDateTime.
oneOf.title: dateTime

___startDateTime.description: Starting date, or date and time.

___endDateTime.description: Ending date, or date and time.

oneOf.description: A timePeriod with a startGeologicAge and/or endGeologicAge.
oneOf.title: geologicAge

___endGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the end of an event or period in geologic time.

___startGeologicAge.description: A name, code, or date for the beginning of an event or period in geologic time.

$eref.description: A span of time represented by a starting date-time and an ending date-time.

_88timeInterval.description: Defines a length of time in specific units.

___units.description: The unit of time for the interval.

_88duration.description: Object for collecting information about a duration or period of time.

___description.description: A brief description providing relevant information about the time period.

___periodName.description: Names associated with the time period.

___id.description: A unique identifier for a time period.

___timePeriod.description: The period for which the allocation is relevant.
